title: Webfont on restaurant website
content:
Does anyone know which font is used at this website:

[http://maaemo.no/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317093922/http:/maaemo.no/ "http://maaemo.no/")

the webfont identification tool says it's a custom font but I can't imagine they made a special font for their website.

Thanks in advance

Font: 

 Maaemo 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317093922/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
author: Mexitexi

comments.content:
It’s Maaemo designed by The Entente (Colophon Foundry) for them.

_Our bespoke typeface for @maaemo with @BielkeYang [http://maaemo.no](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317093922/http:/maaemo.no/ "http://maaemo.no")_   
 [https://twitter.com/colophonfoundry/status/535025504198590464](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317093922/https:/twitter.com/colophonfoundry/status/535025504198590464 "https://twitter.com/colophonfoundry/status/535025504198590464")
Ow ok, thanks. I already thought it looked a bit like Apercu from Colophon
